name: EventKey
description: This event is fired when a key is pressed or released.
overview:
Fires when keyboard or mouse keys are pressed/released.
- The `action` field indicates press (1) or release (0)
- The `key` field contains the key translation key
- The `mods` field contains held modifier keys
- This event is cancellable - preventing the original key action
- Can be filtered to only trigger for specific keys

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.

methods.name: getKeyModifiers
methods.description: Converts an integer modifier mask to a translation key string. This is a static method for converting modifier bit masks to readable strings.

methods.name: getModInt
methods.description: Converts a translation key string to an integer modifier mask. This is a static method for converting readable modifier strings back to integer masks.
